###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

central_bank_interest_actual = {
	remove_modifier = central_bank_interest
    add_modifier = {
        name = central_bank_interest
        multiplier = vo_interest_value
    }
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

ef_ai_currency_exchange_decisions = {
    change_variable = {
		name = ai_against_global_monetary_reference_1
		subtract = 1
	}
}

sell_limit_currency_var_0 = {

		name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
		value = 0
	}
}

		value = 0

# ███████╗██╗     ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗        ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗

fluctuations_money_value_1_month = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1M
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1M = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_month_1
            value = money_value
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1M = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_month_2
            value = money_value
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01
            add = var:money_value_var_month_2
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01
            divide = var:money_value_var_month_1
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1M
            value = 0
        }
    }
}

fluctuations_money_value_1_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_half_1_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_1_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_1
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_1
            add = var:money_value_var_1_year
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_1
            divide = var:money_value_var_half_1_year
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y
            value = 0
        }
    }
}

fluctuations_money_value_5_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_half_5_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_5_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_5
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_5
            add = var:money_value_var_5_year
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_5
            divide = var:money_value_var_half_5_year
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y
            value = 0
        }
    }
}

fluctuations_money_value_10_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_half_10_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y = 10
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_10_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_10
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_10
            add = var:money_value_var_10_year
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_10
            divide = var:money_value_var_half_10_year
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y
            value = 0
        }
    }
}

country_gold_reserve_unlimited = {
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_modifier = country_gold_reserve_unlimited
        }
        remove_modifier = country_gold_reserve_unlimited
    }
    add_modifier = {
        name = country_gold_reserve_unlimited
    }
}

stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            central_bank_gold_reserves_market_goods_sell_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
            add = central_bank_gold_reserves_market_goods_sell_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
            multiply = 100 #multiplicateur d'or entrant
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_state = {
    every_scope_state = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
                #is_homeland_of_country_cultures = ROOT
            }
            save_scope_as = central_bank_site
            scope:central_bank_site = {
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = root.var:stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

gold_balance_transfert_to_gold_reserve = {
	change_variable = {
		name = credit_at_central_bank
		subtract = var:gold_balance
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:credit_at_central_bank < 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = credit_at_central_bank
			multiply = -1
		}
		add_treasury = {
			add = var:credit_at_central_bank
		}
		# every_scope_state = {
		# 	if = {
		# 		limit = {
		# 			has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
		# 			is_capital = yes
		# 		}
		# 		change_variable = {
		# 			name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
		# 			add = root.var:credit_at_central_bank
		# 		}
		# 	}
		# }
		set_variable = {
			name = credit_at_central_bank
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = gold_balance
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

trade_balance = {
	
	# change_variable = {
	# 	name = trade_balance_in_currency
	# 	add = delta_value_in_currency
	# }
	# change_variable = {
	# 	name = trade_balance_in_gold
	# 	add = delta_value_in_gold
	# }


	change_variable = {
		name =  export_value_in_gold
		add = export_value_in_gold_week 
		#add = export_value_in_currency_week = cette valeur représente la somme de la totalité des devise reçu
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = import_value_in_currency
		add = import_value_in_currency_week
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = trade_balance_in_gold_fixe
		value = trade_balance_in_gold
	}
}

# ███████╗████████╗ ██████╗  ██████╗██╗  ██╗██████╗ ██╗██╗     ██╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗      ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔═══██╗██╔════╝██║ ██╔╝██╔══██╗██║██║     ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝     ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ███████╗   ██║   ██║   ██║██║     █████╔╝ ██████╔╝██║██║     ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║  ███╗    ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝ 
# ╚════██║   ██║   ██║   ██║██║     ██╔═██╗ ██╔═══╝ ██║██║     ██║██║╚██╗██║██║   ██║    ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝  
# ███████║   ██║   ╚██████╔╝╚██████╗██║  ██╗██║     ██║███████╗██║██║ ╚████║╚██████╔╝    ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║   
# ╚══════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝

#begin_tag_2	
#algerian_dinar
stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_algerian_dinar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_algerian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_algerian_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_algerian_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_algerian_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#argentine_peso
stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_argentine_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			add = argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_argentine_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_argentine_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_argentine_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			add = argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ariary
stockpiling_ariary_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_ariary_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				ariary_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_ariary > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_2
			add = ariary_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
				}
				export_in_ariary > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_2
				add = export_in_ariary
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ariary_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_ariary_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_ariary_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ariary_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_ariary_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			ariary_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ariary_c_var_2
			add = ariary_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ariary_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ariary_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_ariary_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_ariary_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ariary_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ariary_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ariary_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ariary_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_australian_dollar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_australian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_australian_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_australian_dollar_c_1 = yes
}

		name = circulating_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_australian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat

		name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_baht_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				baht_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_baht > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_2
			add = baht_c_market_goods_delta
		}

			name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}

			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
				}
				export_in_baht > 0
			}

				name = stockpiling_baht_c_var_2
				add = export_in_baht
			}
		}

				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1

			}

			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target

			}

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

								name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_baht_c_var_1

			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_baht_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_baht_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

	circulating_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			add = bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#belgian_franc
stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_belgian_franc > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			add = belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
				}
				export_in_belgian_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = export_in_belgian_franc
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_belgian_franc_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			add = belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#brazilian_real
stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_brazilian_real > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			add = brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
				}
				export_in_brazilian_real > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = export_in_brazilian_real
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_brazilian_real_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_brazilian_real_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			brazilian_real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			add = brazilian_real_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_brazilian_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#canadian_dollar
stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_canadian_dollar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_canadian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_canadian_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_canadian_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_canadian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			or = {
				caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0

		}

		}

			}

		name = circulating_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2

		}

stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#central_african_eco
stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				central_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_central_african_eco > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = central_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
				}
				export_in_central_african_eco > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = export_in_central_african_eco
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_central_african_eco_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_central_african_eco_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			central_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = central_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_central_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_central_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#chilean_peso
stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_chilean_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			add = chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_chilean_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_chilean_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_chilean_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_chilean_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			add = chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_chilean_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################

		name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state
	}

		name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			or = {
				colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0

			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_2

				var:devaluation_on = 1

			}
			change_variable = {

			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0

			}

		}

			add = var:circulating_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_colombian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

								value = root.var:stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_confederate_states_dollar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_confederate_states_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#costa_rican_colon
stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_costa_rican_colon > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			add = costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
				}
				export_in_costa_rican_colon > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				add = export_in_costa_rican_colon
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_costa_rican_colon_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_costa_rican_colon_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			add = costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#cuban_peso
stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_cuban_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			add = cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_cuban_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_cuban_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_cuban_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			add = cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_cuban_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

							}

					}

		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {

								name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_czech_koruna_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}

stockpiling_danish_krone_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_danish_krone_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_danish_krone_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_danish_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_danish_krone > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_danish_krone_c_var_2
			add = danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_danish_krone_c_var_2

				not  = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}

						is_capital = yes

								name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_danish_krone_c_var_1

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_danish_krone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dong
stockpiling_dong_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dong_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dong_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dong > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_2
			add = dong_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
				}
				export_in_dong > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dong
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dong_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dong_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dong_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dong_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dong_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dong_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dong_c_var_2
			add = dong_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dong_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dong_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dong_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dong_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dong_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dong_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dong_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dong_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dong_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dong_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dong_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#drachma
stockpiling_drachma_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_drachma_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				drachma_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_drachma > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
			add = drachma_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
				}
				export_in_drachma > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
				add = export_in_drachma
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_drachma_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_drachma_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_drachma_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_drachma_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			drachma_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_drachma_c_var_2
			add = drachma_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_drachma_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_drachma_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_drachma_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_drachma_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_drachma_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_drachma_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
