		value = stockpiling_ducato_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ducato_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				ducato_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_ducato > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ducato_c_var_2
			add = ducato_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ducato_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}

			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
				}
				export_in_ducato > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ducato_c_var_2
				add = export_in_ducato

			}

		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ducato_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}

			add = var:stockpiling_ducato_c_var_2
		}

			}

						is_capital = yes

					scope:central_bank_site = {

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_east_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ecuadorian_peso
stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_ecuadorian_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			add = ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_ecuadorian_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_ecuadorian_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			add = ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#egyptian_pound
stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_egyptian_pound > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
			add = egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
				}
				export_in_egyptian_pound > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
				add = export_in_egyptian_pound
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_egyptian_pound_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_egyptian_pound_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
			add = egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2

			or = {

			}
		}
		change_variable = {

stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colon_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colon_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colon_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state
	}

		name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			or = {
				estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_estonian_kroon > 0
			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
			add = estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_delta

			name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_c_var_2

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ethiopian_birr
stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_ethiopian_birr > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			add = ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
				}
				export_in_ethiopian_birr > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = export_in_ethiopian_birr
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			add = ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_finnish_markka > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			add = finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
				}
				export_in_finnish_markka > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = export_in_finnish_markka
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_finnish_markka_c_1 = yes
}

		name = circulating_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			add = finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {

			add = var:circulating_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_finnish_markka_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#florin
stockpiling_florin_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_florin_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				florin_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_florin > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
			add = florin_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
				}
				export_in_florin > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
				add = export_in_florin
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_florin_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_florin_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_florin_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_florin_c_var_2
			add = florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_florin_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_florin_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_florin_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_florin_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_florin_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_florin_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_french_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_french_franc_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				french_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_french_franc > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_2
			add = french_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
				}
				export_in_french_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_2
				add = export_in_french_franc
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}

				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0

			}

			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_1

								name = stockpiling_french_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_french_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_french_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_french_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_ghanaian_cedi > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
			add = ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
				}
				export_in_ghanaian_cedi > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
				add = export_in_ghanaian_cedi
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
			add = ghanaian_cedi_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#gulden
stockpiling_gulden_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_gulden > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				}
				export_in_gulden > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = export_in_gulden
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_gulden_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_gulden_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
			add = guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				}
				export_in_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
				add = export_in_guatemalan_quetzal
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation

				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
			}
			change_variable = {

		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_guatemalan_quetzal_c_1 = yes
}

								value = root.var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1

		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {

								name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1

					}

			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				has_law = law_type:law_hannoveraner_thaler_currency

				}

						is_capital = yes

					}

			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_honduran_lempira > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			add = honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
				}
				export_in_honduran_lempira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_honduran_lempira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_honduran_lempira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_honduran_lempira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			add = honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#hungarian_forint
stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_hungarian_forint > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			add = hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
				}
				export_in_hungarian_forint > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = export_in_hungarian_forint
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_hungarian_forint_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			add = hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_icelandic_krona > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
			add = icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
				}
				export_in_icelandic_krona > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				add = export_in_icelandic_krona
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_icelandic_krona_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_icelandic_krona_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_icelandic_krona_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				indian_rupee_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_indian_rupee > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			add = indian_rupee_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
				}
				export_in_indian_rupee > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_2
				add = export_in_indian_rupee
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_2

					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes

						}

				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indian_rupee_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

stockpiling_indies_guilder_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_indies_guilder_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indies_guilder_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_indies_guilder_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indies_guilder_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_indies_guilder_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indies_guilder_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#indonesian_rupiah
stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_indonesian_rupiah > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			add = indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				}
				export_in_indonesian_rupiah > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = export_in_indonesian_rupiah
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			add = indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_iraqi_dinar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			add = iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_iraqi_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_iraqi_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_iraqi_dinar_c_1 = yes
}

		name = circulating_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			add = iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_irish_pound_state
	}

		name = stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

			or = {
				irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_irish_pound > 0
			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_2
			add = irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta
		}

			name = stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4

				}
				export_in_irish_pound > 0

			}

			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_1

		name = circulating_irish_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0

		}

			add = var:circulating_irish_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_irish_pound_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_irish_pound_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					scope:central_bank_site = {

							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_irish_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = stockpiling_korean_won_state
	}

		name = stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_2
		value = 0

				korean_won_c_market_goods_delta > 0

					scope:central_bank_site = {
