							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_korean_won_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#laotian_kip
stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				laotian_kip_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_laotian_kip > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_2
			add = laotian_kip_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
				}
				export_in_laotian_kip > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_2
				add = export_in_laotian_kip
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_laotian_kip_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_laotian_kip_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_laotian_kip_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			laotian_kip_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_laotian_kip_c_var_2
			add = laotian_kip_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_laotian_kip_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_laotian_kip_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_laotian_kip_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_laotian_kip_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#latvian_lats
stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_latvian_lats > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			add = latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
				}
				export_in_latvian_lats > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				add = export_in_latvian_lats
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_latvian_lats_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_latvian_lats_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			add = latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_latvian_lats_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#leu
stockpiling_leu_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_leu_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				leu_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_leu > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_2
			add = leu_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
				}
				export_in_leu > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_2
				add = export_in_leu
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leu_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_leu_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_leu_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_leu_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_leu_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			leu_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_leu_c_var_2
			add = leu_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_leu_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_leu_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_leu_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_leu_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_leu_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_leu_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_leu_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_leu_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lev
stockpiling_lev_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lev_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lev_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lev > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_2
			add = lev_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
				}
				export_in_lev > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lev
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lev_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lev_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_lev_c_1 = yes

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lev_c_var_2
		value = 0

		}

			name = circulating_lev_c_var_2
			add = lev_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lev_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lev_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lev_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lev_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lev_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lev_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lev_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lev_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#liberian_dollar
stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_liberian_dollar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_liberian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_liberian_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_liberian_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_liberian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#libyan_dinar
stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_libyan_dinar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			add = libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_libyan_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_libyan_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_libyan_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_libyan_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			add = libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lira
stockpiling_lira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lira > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				}
				export_in_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_lira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state

		name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta > 0

			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			add = lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			multiply = 4

			limit = {
				not  = {

			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation

				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
			}

			name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1

		}
	}

		}

			add = var:circulating_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
		}

stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_state_1 = {

				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes

								name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1

				has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency

				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		value = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state
	}

		name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0

			or = {
				luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0

			}
		}

			add = luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta

			name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2

				not  = {

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation

				has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency

stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#mark
stockpiling_mark_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_mark_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				mark_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_mark > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			add = mark_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				}
				export_in_mark > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = export_in_mark
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_mark_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_mark_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
			add = mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_mark_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#mexican_peso
stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_mexican_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			add = mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_mexican_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_mexican_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_mexican_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_mexican_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			add = mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mexican_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_moroccan_dirham > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			add = moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			multiply = 4

		}

					has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency

					is_in_revaluation = yes

				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#new_zealand_dollar
stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_new_zealand_dollar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			add = new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_new_zealand_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_new_zealand_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {

				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0

				has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			}

								name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {

						is_capital = yes

					scope:central_bank_site = {

							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#nicaraguan_cordoba
stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			add = nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
				}
				export_in_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				add = export_in_nicaraguan_cordoba
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			add = nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#nigerian_naira
stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_nigerian_naira > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			add = nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
				}
				export_in_nigerian_naira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_nigerian_naira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_nigerian_naira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_nigerian_naira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			add = nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_norwegian_krone > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
			add = norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
				}
				export_in_norwegian_krone > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
				add = export_in_norwegian_krone
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_norwegian_krone_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
			add = norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#omanian_rial
stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_omanian_rial > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			add = omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
				}
				export_in_omanian_rial > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = export_in_omanian_rial
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_omanian_rial_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		value = 0

		limit = {
			omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			add = omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_omanian_rial_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ottoman_lira
stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_ottoman_lira > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			add = ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
				}
				export_in_ottoman_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_ottoman_lira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_ottoman_lira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_ottoman_lira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			add = ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#pakistani_rupee
stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				pakistani_rupee_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_pakistani_rupee > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
			add = pakistani_rupee_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
				}
				export_in_pakistani_rupee > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
				add = export_in_pakistani_rupee
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_pakistani_rupee_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_pakistani_rupee_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			pakistani_rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
			add = pakistani_rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pakistani_rupee_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_pakistani_rupee_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				paraguayan_guarani_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_paraguayan_guarani > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
			add = paraguayan_guarani_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
				}
				export_in_paraguayan_guarani > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
				add = export_in_paraguayan_guarani
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_paraguayan_guarani_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_paraguayan_guarani_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			paraguayan_guarani_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
			add = paraguayan_guarani_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peseta
stockpiling_peseta_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peseta_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peseta_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peseta > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
			add = peseta_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
				}
				export_in_peseta > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peseta
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peseta_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peseta_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peseta_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peseta_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peseta_c_var_2
			add = peseta_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peseta_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peseta_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peseta_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peseta_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peseta_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peseta_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = stockpiling_peso_state

		value = 0
	}

				peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso > 0
			}

			add = peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}

			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2

				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso
