stockpiling_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_bolivien
stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_bolivien_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_bolivien > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
			add = peso_bolivien_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_bolivien > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_bolivien
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_bolivien_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_bolivien_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_bolivien_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
			add = peso_bolivien_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_bolivien_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#philippine_peso
stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_philippine_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			add = philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_philippine_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_philippine_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_philippine_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_philippine_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			add = philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_philippine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_1 = {

	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				pound_sterling_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_pound_sterling > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			add = pound_sterling_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}

			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				}
				export_in_pound_sterling > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = export_in_pound_sterling
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_pound_sterling_c_1 = yes

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			pound_sterling_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			add = pound_sterling_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}

								name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_prussian_thaler_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#qiran
stockpiling_qiran_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_qiran_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				qiran_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_qiran > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
			add = qiran_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
				}
				export_in_qiran > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
				add = export_in_qiran
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_qiran_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_qiran_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_qiran_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_qiran_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			qiran_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_qiran_c_var_2
			add = qiran_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_qiran_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_qiran_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_qiran_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_qiran_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_qiran_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_qiran_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#real
stockpiling_real_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_real_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_real > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
			add = real_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				}
				export_in_real > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = export_in_real
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_real_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_real_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_2
			add = real_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_ruble_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_ruble_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				ruble_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_ruble > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
			add = ruble_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
				}
				export_in_ruble > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
				add = export_in_ruble
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_ruble_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_ruble_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_ruble_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_ruble_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			ruble_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ruble_c_var_2
			add = ruble_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ruble_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_ruble_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_ruble_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_ruble_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_ruble_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ruble_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ruble_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_ruble_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state

		name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			or = {
				saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta > 0

			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			add = saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta

			name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_c_var_2

				not  = {

					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					scope:central_bank_site = {

								name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################

		value = 0
	}

			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
			add = saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_delta
		}

			name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_2

		}

			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
				}
				export_in_saxon_thaler > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
				add = export_in_saxon_thaler
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_saxon_thaler_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_saxon_thaler_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
			add = saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#scudo_pontificio
stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_scudo_pontificio > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			add = scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
				}
				export_in_scudo_pontificio > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				add = export_in_scudo_pontificio
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_scudo_pontificio_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_scudo_pontificio_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			add = scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#scudo_sardo
stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_scudo_sardo > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			add = scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
				}
				export_in_scudo_sardo > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = export_in_scudo_sardo
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_scudo_sardo_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_scudo_sardo_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			add = scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_serbian_dinar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_serbian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_serbian_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}
	stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#slovak_koruna
stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_slovak_koruna > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			add = slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
				}
				export_in_slovak_koruna > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				add = export_in_slovak_koruna
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_slovak_koruna_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_slovak_koruna_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			add = slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#sol_de_oro
stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_sol_de_oro > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			add = sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
				}
				export_in_sol_de_oro > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				add = export_in_sol_de_oro
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_sol_de_oro_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_sol_de_oro_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			add = sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
	}

		name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			or = {
				south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_south_african_rand > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			add = south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			multiply = 4

				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency

			}
			change_variable = {

			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation

				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}

						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_south_african_rand_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1

							}

					}

stockpiling_south_german_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_south_german_gulden_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#swedish_krona
stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_swedish_krona > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			add = swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
				}
				export_in_swedish_krona > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				add = export_in_swedish_krona
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_swedish_krona_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_swedish_krona_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			swedish_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			add = swedish_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_swedish_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#swiss_franc
stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_swiss_franc > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			add = swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
				}
				export_in_swiss_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = export_in_swiss_franc
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_swiss_franc_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_swiss_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			add = swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_swiss_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################

		name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

		name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0

			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			add = toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_2

		}

		}

			add = var:circulating_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_toscane_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#tuareg_ouguiya
stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			add = tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				}
				export_in_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = export_in_tuareg_ouguiya
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			add = tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#uni
stockpiling_uni_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_uni_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				uni_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_uni > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_2
			add = uni_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
				}
				export_in_uni > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_2
				add = export_in_uni
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_uni_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_uni_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_uni_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_uni_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_uni_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			uni_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_uni_c_var_2
			add = uni_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_uni_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_uni_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_uni_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_uni_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_uni_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_uni_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_uni_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_uni_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#united_states_dollar
stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_united_states_dollar > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_united_states_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_united_states_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_united_states_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_united_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#uruguayan_peso
stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_uruguayan_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			add = uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_uruguayan_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_uruguayan_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2

			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
		}
