							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#venezuelan_peso
stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			or = {
				venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_venezuelan_peso > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
			add = venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_venezuelan_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_venezuelan_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_venezuelan_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_venezuelan_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
			add = venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#west_african_eco
stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_west_african_eco > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
				}
				export_in_west_african_eco > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = export_in_west_african_eco
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_west_african_eco_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_west_african_eco_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			west_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = west_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_west_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_west_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#yen
stockpiling_yen_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_yen_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				yen_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_yen > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_2
			add = yen_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
				}
				export_in_yen > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_2
				add = export_in_yen
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_yen_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_yen_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_yen_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_yen_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_yen_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			yen_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_yen_c_var_2
			add = yen_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_yen_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_yen_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_yen_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_yen_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_yen_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_yen_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_yen_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_yen_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

						}
					}

					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}

		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#zloti
stockpiling_zloti_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_zloti_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				zloti_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_zloti > 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
			add = zloti_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
				}
				export_in_zloti > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
				add = export_in_zloti
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				#money_supply_to_add_per_week > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_zloti_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_zloti_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_zloti_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_zloti_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_zloti_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			zloti_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_zloti_c_var_2
			add = zloti_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_zloti_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_zloti_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_zloti_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_zloti_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_zloti_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_revaluation = yes
					not  = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_zloti_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
				is_in_devaluation = yes
				not  = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_zloti_c_var_1 
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_zloti_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#end_tag_2

stockpiling_capital_state_transfert = {
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
				is_capital = no
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_no_capital
		}
	}
	#actual Capital
	scope:central_bank_site_capital = {

		#gold
		change_variable = {
			name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
			add = {
				scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
					add = var:central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
				}
			}
		}

		#Financial product
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
			add = {
				scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
					add = var:stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_company_stock_var_state_1
			add = {
				scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
					add = var:stockpiling_company_stock_var_state_1
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
			add = {
				scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
					add = var:stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
			add = {
				scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
					add = var:stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
				}
			}
		}

		#Goods

				scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
					add = var:stockpiling_grain_state_1
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
			add = {
				scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
					add = var:stockpiling_wood_state_1
				}

			months = 1
		}

			name = financial_center_place
			months = 1

			months = 1

		}

			name = national_stockpile_place
			months = 1
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = national_stockpile_historic_place
			months = 1
		}

# ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║ ██╔╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██████╔╝███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██╔╝   ██║  ██║███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝    ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################

devaluation_on = {
    change_variable = {
        name = devaluation_on_time
        add = 1
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:devaluation_on_time = devaluation_time_month
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = devaluation_on
            value = 0
        }
        set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = var:money_value_target_valided
		}



        ############# Reset
        set_variable = {
			name = devaluation_on_time
			value = 0
		}
    }
}

revaluation_on = {
    change_variable = {
        name = revaluation_on_time
        add = 1
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:revaluation_on_time = revaluation_time_month
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = revaluation_on
            value = 0
        }
        set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = var:money_value_target_valided
		}


        ############# Reset
        set_variable = {
			name = revaluation_on_time
			value = 0
		}
    }
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#  █████╗ ██╗        ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██╗   ██╗     ███████╗███████╗██╗     ██╗             ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗███████╗         ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔══██╗██║        ██╔══██╗██║   ██║╚██╗ ██╔╝     ██╔════╝██╔════╝██║     ██║             ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝        ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ███████║██║        ██████╔╝██║   ██║ ╚████╔╝      ███████╗█████╗  ██║     ██║             ██████╔╝█████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║     █████╗          ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██╔══██║██║        ██╔══██╗██║   ██║  ╚██╔╝       ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██║             ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║     ██╔══╝          ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ██║  ██║██║███████╗██████╔╝╚██████╔╝   ██║███████╗███████║███████╗███████╗███████╗███████╗██║  ██║███████╗██║     ███████╗██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗███████╗███████╗╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝╚══════╝╚═════╝  ╚═════╝    ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝

#begin_tag_5	
	#algerian_dinar
	algerian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = algerian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_algerian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = algerian_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #algerian_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = algerian_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:algerian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_algerian_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_algerian_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = algerian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_algerian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = algerian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #algerian_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = algerian_dinar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state > var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_algerian_dinar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_algerian_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#argentine_peso
	argentine_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {

	        name = argentine_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }

	                    limit = {
	                        var:argentine_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_argentine_peso_state

	                        }

	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }

	                        }

	                        value = 1
	                    }

	        }

	    }

	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }

	        variable = argentine_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner

	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner

	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }

	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

	                    }
	                }

	                    name = argentine_peso_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }

	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold

	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                        }

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########

	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########

	#ariary
	ariary_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = ariary_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_ariary_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ariary_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #ariary
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = ariary_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ariary_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:ariary_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:ariary_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ariary_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ariary_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ariary_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = ariary_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_ariary_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ariary_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_ariary_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #ariary
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = ariary_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_ariary_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ariary_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:ariary_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_ariary_state > var:ariary_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ariary_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ariary_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#australian_dollar
	australian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = australian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_australian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = australian_dollar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #australian_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = australian_dollar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:australian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_australian_dollar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_australian_dollar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_australian_dollar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = australian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_australian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = australian_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_australian_dollar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #australian_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = australian_dollar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_australian_dollar_state > var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_australian_dollar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_australian_dollar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#bahraini_dinar
	bahraini_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = bahraini_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = bahraini_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #bahraini_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:bahraini_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_bahraini_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bahraini_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bahraini_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = bahraini_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_bahraini_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = bahraini_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
