	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #bahraini_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state > var:bahraini_dinar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bahraini_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bahraini_dinar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bahraini_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#baht
	baht_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = baht_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_baht_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = baht_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #baht
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = baht_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:baht_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:baht_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:baht_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_baht_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_baht_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_baht_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = baht_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_baht_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = baht_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_baht_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #baht
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = baht_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_baht_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:baht_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:baht_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_baht_state > var:baht_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_baht_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_baht_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#bavarian_gulden
	bavarian_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = bavarian_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = bavarian_gulden_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #bavarian_gulden
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:bavarian_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bavarian_gulden_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bavarian_gulden_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = bavarian_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_bavarian_gulden_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }

	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }

	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }

	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                }

	                        has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency

	                    }

	                        value = 1

	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold

	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state > var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bavarian_gulden_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_bavarian_gulden_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#belgian_franc
	belgian_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = belgian_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_belgian_franc_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = belgian_franc_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #belgian_franc
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = belgian_franc_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:belgian_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_belgian_franc_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_belgian_franc_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_belgian_franc_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = belgian_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_belgian_franc_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = belgian_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_belgian_franc_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #belgian_franc
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = belgian_franc_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_belgian_franc_state > var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_belgian_franc_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_belgian_franc_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#brazilian_real
	brazilian_real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = brazilian_real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_brazilian_real_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = brazilian_real_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #brazilian_real
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = brazilian_real_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:brazilian_real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_brazilian_real_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = brazilian_real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_brazilian_real_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification

	    }

	                }
	            }

	        }

	            #brazilian_real

	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes

	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = brazilian_real_quantity_var

	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold

	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var

	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_brazilian_real_state > var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_brazilian_real_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#canadian_dollar
	canadian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = canadian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_canadian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = canadian_dollar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #canadian_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = canadian_dollar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:canadian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_canadian_dollar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_canadian_dollar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = canadian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }

	                            }

	                    }
	                }
	            }

	#caribbean_dollar
	caribbean_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = caribbean_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = caribbean_dollar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency

	            }
	        }

	            #caribbean_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:caribbean_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_caribbean_dollar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_caribbean_dollar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = caribbean_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_caribbean_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = caribbean_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #caribbean_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state > var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_caribbean_dollar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_caribbean_dollar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#central_african_eco
	central_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = central_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_central_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = central_african_eco_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #central_african_eco
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = central_african_eco_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:central_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_central_african_eco_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = central_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_central_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = central_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_central_african_eco_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #central_african_eco
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = central_african_eco_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_central_african_eco_state > var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_central_african_eco_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
