	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {

	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

	                                }
	                                #########

	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification

	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }

	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }

	ducato_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = ducato_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_ducato_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ducato_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }

	            #ducato
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ducato_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:ducato_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        var:ducato_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                        }

	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ducato_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ducato_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = ducato_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_ducato_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ducato_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_ducato_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #ducato
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = ducato_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_ducato_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ducato_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:ducato_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_ducato_state > var:ducato_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ducato_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ducato_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#drachma
	drachma_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = drachma_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_drachma_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = drachma_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #drachma
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = drachma_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:drachma_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:drachma_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:drachma_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_drachma_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = drachma_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_drachma_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = drachma_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_drachma_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #drachma
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = drachma_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_drachma_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:drachma_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:drachma_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_drachma_state > var:drachma_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_drachma_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#ecuadorian_peso
	ecuadorian_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = ecuadorian_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ecuadorian_peso_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #ecuadorian_peso
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:ecuadorian_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ecuadorian_peso_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ecuadorian_peso_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = ecuadorian_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }

	        variable = ecuadorian_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }

	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner

	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                }

	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency

	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }

	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }

	                    value = var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state > var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ecuadorian_peso_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ecuadorian_peso_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#egyptian_pound
	egyptian_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = egyptian_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_egyptian_pound_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = egyptian_pound_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #egyptian_pound
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = egyptian_pound_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:egyptian_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_egyptian_pound_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_egyptian_pound_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = egyptian_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_egyptian_pound_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = egyptian_pound_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #egyptian_pound
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = egyptian_pound_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state > var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_egyptian_pound_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_egyptian_pound_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#estonian_kroon
	estonian_kroon_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = estonian_kroon_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_estonian_kroon_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = estonian_kroon_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #estonian_kroon
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = estonian_kroon_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:estonian_kroon_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = estonian_kroon_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_estonian_kroon_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = estonian_kroon_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }

	        }

	            #estonian_kroon
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = estonian_kroon_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state > var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_estonian_kroon_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#ethiopian_birr
	ethiopian_birr_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = ethiopian_birr_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ethiopian_birr_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #ethiopian_birr
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:ethiopian_birr_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ethiopian_birr_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ethiopian_birr_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = ethiopian_birr_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }

	        variable = ethiopian_birr_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real

	                }

	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }

	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }

	                            #########
