	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_hannoveraner_thaler_state > var:hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hannoveraner_thaler_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hannoveraner_thaler_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#honduran_lempira
	honduran_lempira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = honduran_lempira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_honduran_lempira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = honduran_lempira_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #honduran_lempira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_honduran_lempira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = honduran_lempira_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:honduran_lempira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:honduran_lempira_quantity_var
	                }

	                        var:honduran_lempira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_honduran_lempira_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = honduran_lempira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }

	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }

	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }

	                        stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state > var:honduran_lempira_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_honduran_lempira_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_honduran_lempira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_honduran_lempira_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#hungarian_forint
	hungarian_forint_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = hungarian_forint_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_hungarian_forint_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = hungarian_forint_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #hungarian_forint
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = hungarian_forint_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:hungarian_forint_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_hungarian_forint_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = hungarian_forint_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_hungarian_forint_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = hungarian_forint_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #hungarian_forint
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_hungarian_forint_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = hungarian_forint_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state > var:hungarian_forint_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_hungarian_forint_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_hungarian_forint_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_hungarian_forint_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#icelandic_krona
	icelandic_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = icelandic_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_icelandic_krona_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = icelandic_krona_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #icelandic_krona
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = icelandic_krona_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:icelandic_krona_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:icelandic_krona_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:icelandic_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_icelandic_krona_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_krona_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_krona_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = icelandic_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_icelandic_krona_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = icelandic_krona_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #icelandic_krona
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_icelandic_krona_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = icelandic_krona_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:icelandic_krona_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:icelandic_krona_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state > var:icelandic_krona_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_icelandic_krona_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_icelandic_krona_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_krona_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_icelandic_krona_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#indian_rupee
	indian_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = indian_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_indian_rupee_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = indian_rupee_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #indian_rupee
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = indian_rupee_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:indian_rupee_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:indian_rupee_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:indian_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_indian_rupee_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_indian_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indian_rupee_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indian_rupee_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = indian_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_indian_rupee_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = indian_rupee_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_indian_rupee_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #indian_rupee
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_indian_rupee_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = indian_rupee_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:indian_rupee_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:indian_rupee_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_indian_rupee_state > var:indian_rupee_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_indian_rupee_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indian_rupee_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indian_rupee_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indian_rupee_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#indies_guilder
	indies_guilder_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = indies_guilder_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_indies_guilder_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = indies_guilder_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_indies_guilder_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #indies_guilder
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_indies_guilder_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = indies_guilder_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:indies_guilder_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:indies_guilder_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:indies_guilder_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_indies_guilder_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_indies_guilder_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indies_guilder_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indies_guilder_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = indies_guilder_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_indies_guilder_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = indies_guilder_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_indies_guilder_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_indies_guilder_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #indies_guilder
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_indies_guilder_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = indies_guilder_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:indies_guilder_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:indies_guilder_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_indies_guilder_state > var:indies_guilder_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_indies_guilder_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indies_guilder_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indies_guilder_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indies_guilder_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#indonesian_rupiah
	indonesian_rupiah_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = indonesian_rupiah_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = indonesian_rupiah_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #indonesian_rupiah
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:indonesian_rupiah_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_indonesian_rupiah_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indonesian_rupiah_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indonesian_rupiah_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = indonesian_rupiah_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = indonesian_rupiah_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real

	            }

	            #indonesian_rupiah

	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency

	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }

	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state > var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var

	                        }

	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
