	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_indonesian_rupiah_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#iraqi_dinar
	iraqi_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = iraqi_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = iraqi_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #iraqi_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:iraqi_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = iraqi_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_iraqi_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = iraqi_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #iraqi_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state > var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_iraqi_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#irish_pound
	irish_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = irish_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_irish_pound_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = irish_pound_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #irish_pound
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = irish_pound_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:irish_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_irish_pound_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_irish_pound_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_irish_pound_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = irish_pound_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_irish_pound_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = irish_pound_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_irish_pound_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #irish_pound
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = irish_pound_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_irish_pound_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_irish_pound_state > var:irish_pound_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_irish_pound_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_irish_pound_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#jordanian_dinar
	jordanian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = jordanian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = jordanian_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #jordanian_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:jordanian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_jordanian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = jordanian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_jordanian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = jordanian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #jordanian_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_jordanian_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state > var:jordanian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_jordanian_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_jordanian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_jordanian_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#korean_won
	korean_won_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = korean_won_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_korean_won_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = korean_won_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #korean_won
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = korean_won_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:korean_won_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:korean_won_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:korean_won_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_korean_won_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_korean_won_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_korean_won_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = korean_won_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_korean_won_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = korean_won_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_korean_won_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #korean_won
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = korean_won_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_korean_won_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:korean_won_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:korean_won_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_korean_won_state > var:korean_won_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_korean_won_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_korean_won_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#latvian_lats
	latvian_lats_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = latvian_lats_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_latvian_lats_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = latvian_lats_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #latvian_lats
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = latvian_lats_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:latvian_lats_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_latvian_lats_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = latvian_lats_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_latvian_lats_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }

	                        multiply = 0.50

	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_latvian_lats_state > var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_latvian_lats_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#leu
	leu_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = leu_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_leu_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = leu_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #leu
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = leu_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:leu_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:leu_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:leu_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_leu_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_leu_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_leu_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = leu_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_leu_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = leu_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_leu_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #leu
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = leu_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_leu_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:leu_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:leu_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_leu_state > var:leu_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_leu_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_leu_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#lev
	lev_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = lev_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_lev_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = lev_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #lev
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = lev_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:lev_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:lev_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:lev_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lev_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lev_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lev_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = lev_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_lev_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller

	        variable = lev_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list

	                }

	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency

	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = lev_quantity_var

	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:lev_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
