	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lev_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lev_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#liberian_dollar
	liberian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = liberian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_liberian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = liberian_dollar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #liberian_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = liberian_dollar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:liberian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_liberian_dollar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_liberian_dollar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = liberian_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	                    }

	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }

	#libyan_dinar
	libyan_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = libyan_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_libyan_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = libyan_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #libyan_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = libyan_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:libyan_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_libyan_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_libyan_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = libyan_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_libyan_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = libyan_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #libyan_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = libyan_dinar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state > var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_libyan_dinar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_libyan_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#lira
	lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_lira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = lira_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #lira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = lira_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:lira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:lira_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lira_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lira_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lira_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_lira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_lira_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #lira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = lira_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_lira_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:lira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:lira_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_lira_state > var:lira_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lira_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lira_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#lithuanian_litas
	lithuanian_litas_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = lithuanian_litas_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = lithuanian_litas_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #lithuanian_litas
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:lithuanian_litas_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = lithuanian_litas_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_lithuanian_litas_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = lithuanian_litas_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #lithuanian_litas
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {

	                        add = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state > var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_lithuanian_litas_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#luxembourgish_franc
	luxembourgish_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = luxembourgish_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #luxembourgish_franc
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:luxembourgish_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = luxembourgish_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #luxembourgish_franc
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state > var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_luxembourgish_franc_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#mark
	mark_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = mark_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_mark_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = mark_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #mark
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = mark_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:mark_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:mark_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:mark_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_mark_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = mark_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_mark_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }

	                    }
	                }

	                    value = var:mark_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_mark_state > var:mark_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mark_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }

	#mexican_peso
	mexican_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = mexican_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_mexican_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = mexican_peso_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #mexican_peso
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = mexican_peso_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    value = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:mexican_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
