	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mexican_peso_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mexican_peso_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = mexican_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_mexican_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = mexican_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_mexican_peso_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #mexican_peso
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = mexican_peso_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_mexican_peso_state > var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mexican_peso_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_mexican_peso_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#moroccan_dirham
	moroccan_dirham_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = moroccan_dirham_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = moroccan_dirham_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #moroccan_dirham
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:moroccan_dirham_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = moroccan_dirham_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_moroccan_dirham_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = moroccan_dirham_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #moroccan_dirham
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state > var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_moroccan_dirham_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#new_zealand_dollar
	new_zealand_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = new_zealand_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = new_zealand_dollar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #new_zealand_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:new_zealand_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_new_zealand_dollar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_new_zealand_dollar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = new_zealand_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {

	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                }
	            }

	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency

	                        value = 1

	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold

	                        value = 1

	                    }

	                        }

	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {

	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_new_zealand_dollar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_new_zealand_dollar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#nicaraguan_cordoba
	nicaraguan_cordoba_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = nicaraguan_cordoba_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = nicaraguan_cordoba_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #nicaraguan_cordoba
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:nicaraguan_cordoba_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = nicaraguan_cordoba_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = nicaraguan_cordoba_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #nicaraguan_cordoba
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state > var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#nigerian_naira
	nigerian_naira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = nigerian_naira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_nigerian_naira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = nigerian_naira_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #nigerian_naira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = nigerian_naira_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:nigerian_naira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = nigerian_naira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_nigerian_naira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = nigerian_naira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #nigerian_naira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = nigerian_naira_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state > var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_nigerian_naira_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#norwegian_krone
	norwegian_krone_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = norwegian_krone_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_norwegian_krone_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = norwegian_krone_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #norwegian_krone
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = norwegian_krone_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:norwegian_krone_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
