	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = norwegian_krone_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_norwegian_krone_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = norwegian_krone_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #norwegian_krone
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = norwegian_krone_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state > var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_norwegian_krone_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#omanian_rial
	omanian_rial_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = omanian_rial_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_omanian_rial_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = omanian_rial_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #omanian_rial
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = omanian_rial_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:omanian_rial_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_omanian_rial_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = omanian_rial_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_omanian_rial_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = omanian_rial_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_omanian_rial_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #omanian_rial
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = omanian_rial_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_omanian_rial_state > var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_omanian_rial_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#ottoman_lira
	ottoman_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = ottoman_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_ottoman_lira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ottoman_lira_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #ottoman_lira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = ottoman_lira_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:ottoman_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = ottoman_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_ottoman_lira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }

	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }

	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner

	                    }

	                    value = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
	                }

	                        stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state > var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }

	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ottoman_lira_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#pakistan_rupee
	pakistan_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = pakistan_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = pakistan_rupee_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #pakistan_rupee
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:pakistan_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistan_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = pakistan_rupee_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_pakistan_rupee_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = pakistan_rupee_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #pakistan_rupee
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_pakistan_rupee_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state > var:pakistan_rupee_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_pakistan_rupee_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistan_rupee_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pakistan_rupee_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#peseta
	peseta_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = peseta_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_peseta_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = peseta_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #peseta
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = peseta_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:peseta_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:peseta_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:peseta_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_peseta_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = peseta_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_peseta_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }

	                    }

	                        }

	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peseta_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {

	        name = peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0

	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }

	        variable = peso_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

	            #peso
	            if = {

	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism

	                    value = {
	                        value = 1

	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########

	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }

	                        limit = {

	                        }

	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }

	                        name = peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }

	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes

	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold

	                                    name = stockpiling_peso_state_1

	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#peso_bolivien
	peso_bolivien_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = peso_bolivien_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_peso_bolivien_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = peso_bolivien_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #peso_bolivien
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = peso_bolivien_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:peso_bolivien_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_bolivien_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_bolivien_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = peso_bolivien_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_peso_bolivien_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = peso_bolivien_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #peso_bolivien
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = peso_bolivien_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state > var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_bolivien_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_peso_bolivien_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#philippine_peso
	philippine_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = philippine_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_philippine_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = philippine_peso_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #philippine_peso
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = philippine_peso_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:philippine_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_philippine_peso_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_philippine_peso_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = philippine_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_philippine_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = philippine_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }

	        }

	            #philippine_peso

	                        has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
	                        or = {

	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = philippine_peso_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_philippine_peso_state > var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_philippine_peso_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_philippine_peso_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }

	pound_sterling_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {

	        name = pound_sterling_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }

	buy_undervalued_pound_sterling_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = pound_sterling_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
	                #money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #pound_sterling
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = pound_sterling_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:pound_sterling_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                        }
