	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pound_sterling_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pound_sterling_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = pound_sterling_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_pound_sterling_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = pound_sterling_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_pound_sterling_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #pound_sterling
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = pound_sterling_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_pound_sterling_state > var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pound_sterling_sell_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_pound_sterling_sell_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#prussian_thaler
	prussian_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = prussian_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_prussian_thaler_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = prussian_thaler_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #prussian_thaler
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = prussian_thaler_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:prussian_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_prussian_thaler_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_prussian_thaler_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = prussian_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_prussian_thaler_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = prussian_thaler_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #prussian_thaler
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = prussian_thaler_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state > var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_prussian_thaler_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_prussian_thaler_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#qatari_riyal
	qatari_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = qatari_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_qatari_riyal_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = qatari_riyal_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #qatari_riyal
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = qatari_riyal_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:qatari_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_qatari_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = qatari_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_qatari_riyal_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = qatari_riyal_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #qatari_riyal
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_qatari_riyal_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = qatari_riyal_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state > var:qatari_riyal_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }

	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_qatari_riyal_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qatari_riyal_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qatari_riyal_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#qiran
	qiran_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = qiran_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_qiran_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = qiran_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #qiran
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = qiran_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:qiran_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:qiran_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:qiran_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_qiran_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = qiran_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_qiran_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = qiran_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_qiran_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #qiran
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = qiran_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_qiran_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:qiran_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:qiran_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_qiran_state > var:qiran_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_qiran_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#real
	real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_real_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = real_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #real
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = real_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:real_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:real_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_real_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_real_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_real_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_real_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_real_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = real_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_real_global_monetary_reference_gs = {

	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_real_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_real_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_real_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_real_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#ruble
	ruble_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = ruble_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_ruble_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = ruble_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #ruble
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = ruble_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:ruble_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:ruble_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        var:ruble_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ruble_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ruble_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = ruble_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }

	                                }

	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_ruble_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#saudi_riyal
	saudi_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = saudi_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_saudi_riyal_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = saudi_riyal_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #saudi_riyal
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = saudi_riyal_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:saudi_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = saudi_riyal_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_saudi_riyal_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = saudi_riyal_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #saudi_riyal
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = saudi_riyal_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state > var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saudi_riyal_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#saxon_thaler
	saxon_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = saxon_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_saxon_thaler_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = saxon_thaler_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #saxon_thaler
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = saxon_thaler_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:saxon_thaler_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:saxon_thaler_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:saxon_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saxon_thaler_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_saxon_thaler_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = saxon_thaler_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	                    value = {

	                            }

	                                name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }

	                            }

	                            }

	        name = scudo_pontificio_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }

	buy_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = scudo_pontificio_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #scudo_pontificio
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:scudo_pontificio_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
