	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = scudo_pontificio_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_scudo_pontificio_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = scudo_pontificio_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #scudo_pontificio
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state > var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_pontificio_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#scudo_sardo
	scudo_sardo_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = scudo_sardo_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_scudo_sardo_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = scudo_sardo_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #scudo_sardo
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = scudo_sardo_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:scudo_sardo_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = scudo_sardo_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_scudo_sardo_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = scudo_sardo_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #scudo_sardo
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = scudo_sardo_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state > var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_scudo_sardo_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#serbian_dinar
	serbian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = serbian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_serbian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = serbian_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #serbian_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = serbian_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:serbian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = serbian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	            is_player = yes

	                            limit = {

	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_serbian_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }

	#south_german_gulden
	south_german_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = south_german_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_south_german_gulden_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = south_german_gulden_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #south_german_gulden
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = south_german_gulden_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:south_german_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_german_gulden_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_german_gulden_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = south_german_gulden_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_south_german_gulden_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = south_german_gulden_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #south_german_gulden
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = south_german_gulden_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state > var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_german_gulden_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_german_gulden_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#singapore_dollar
	singapore_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = singapore_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_singapore_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = singapore_dollar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_singapore_dollar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #singapore_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_singapore_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = singapore_dollar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:singapore_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:singapore_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:singapore_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_singapore_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_singapore_dollar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_singapore_dollar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = singapore_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_singapore_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = singapore_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_singapore_dollar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #singapore_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_singapore_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = singapore_dollar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:singapore_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:singapore_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state > var:singapore_dollar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_singapore_dollar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_singapore_dollar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_singapore_dollar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_singapore_dollar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#slovak_koruna
	slovak_koruna_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = slovak_koruna_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_slovak_koruna_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = slovak_koruna_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #slovak_koruna
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = slovak_koruna_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:slovak_koruna_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state

	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = slovak_koruna_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_slovak_koruna_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = slovak_koruna_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }

	        limit = {

	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state > var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
