	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_slovak_koruna_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#sol_de_oro
	sol_de_oro_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = sol_de_oro_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_sol_de_oro_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = sol_de_oro_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #sol_de_oro
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = sol_de_oro_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:sol_de_oro_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sol_de_oro_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sol_de_oro_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = sol_de_oro_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_sol_de_oro_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = sol_de_oro_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #sol_de_oro
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = sol_de_oro_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state > var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sol_de_oro_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_sol_de_oro_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#south_african_rand
	south_african_rand_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = south_african_rand_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_south_african_rand_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = south_african_rand_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #south_african_rand
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = south_african_rand_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:south_african_rand_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = south_african_rand_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_south_african_rand_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = south_african_rand_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_south_african_rand_state > 1000000
	        }

	            #south_african_rand
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = south_african_rand_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_south_african_rand_state > var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_south_african_rand_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }

	#swedish_krona
	swedish_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = swedish_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_swedish_krona_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = swedish_krona_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #swedish_krona
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = swedish_krona_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:swedish_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = swedish_krona_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_swedish_krona_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = swedish_krona_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_swedish_krona_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #swedish_krona
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = swedish_krona_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_swedish_krona_state > var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swedish_krona_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#swiss_franc
	swiss_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = swiss_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_swiss_franc_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = swiss_franc_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #swiss_franc
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = swiss_franc_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:swiss_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_swiss_franc_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swiss_franc_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swiss_franc_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = swiss_franc_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_swiss_franc_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = swiss_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_swiss_franc_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #swiss_franc
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = swiss_franc_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_swiss_franc_state > var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swiss_franc_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_swiss_franc_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#tical
	tical_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = tical_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_tical_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = tical_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #tical
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_tical_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = tical_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:tical_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:tical_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:tical_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tical_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_tical_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tical_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tical_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = tical_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	                            }

	                            }

	                                name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_tical_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification

	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tical_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tical_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tical_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }

	            }
	        }
