	#toscane_lira
	toscane_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = toscane_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_toscane_lira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = toscane_lira_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #toscane_lira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = toscane_lira_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:toscane_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = toscane_lira_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_toscane_lira_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = toscane_lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_toscane_lira_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #toscane_lira
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = toscane_lira_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_toscane_lira_state > var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_toscane_lira_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#tunisian_dinar
	tunisian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = tunisian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #tunisian_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:tunisian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = tunisian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_tunisian_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #tunisian_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state > var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tunisian_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#tuareg_ouguiya
	tuareg_ouguiya_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = tuareg_ouguiya_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = tuareg_ouguiya_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #tuareg_ouguiya
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:tuareg_ouguiya_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tuareg_ouguiya_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tuareg_ouguiya_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = tuareg_ouguiya_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = tuareg_ouguiya_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #tuareg_ouguiya
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state > var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tuareg_ouguiya_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_tuareg_ouguiya_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#uni
	uni_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = uni_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_uni_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = uni_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #uni
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = uni_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:uni_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:uni_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:uni_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_uni_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uni_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uni_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = uni_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_uni_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = uni_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_uni_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #uni
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = uni_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_uni_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:uni_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:uni_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_uni_state > var:uni_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uni_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_uni_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#united_states_dollar
	united_states_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = united_states_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_united_states_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = united_states_dollar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #united_states_dollar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = united_states_dollar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:united_states_dollar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:united_states_dollar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:united_states_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_united_states_dollar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_united_states_dollar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = united_states_dollar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_united_states_dollar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }

	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }

	        variable = united_states_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }

	        limit = {

	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_united_states_dollar_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_united_states_dollar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }

	#venezuelan_peso
	venezuelan_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = venezuelan_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = venezuelan_peso_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #venezuelan_peso
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:venezuelan_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_venezuelan_peso_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_venezuelan_peso_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = venezuelan_peso_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_venezuelan_peso_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = venezuelan_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #venezuelan_peso
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state > var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_venezuelan_peso_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_venezuelan_peso_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#west_african_eco
	west_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = west_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_west_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = west_african_eco_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #west_african_eco
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = west_african_eco_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:west_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_west_african_eco_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = west_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_west_african_eco_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = west_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_west_african_eco_state > 1000000
	        }

	            #west_african_eco
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency

	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = west_african_eco_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
	                }
