	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_west_african_eco_state > var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_west_african_eco_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#yen
	yen_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = yen_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_yen_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = yen_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #yen
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = yen_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:yen_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:yen_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:yen_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yen_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yen_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yen_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = yen_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	            is_player = yes

	                    }
	                }

	                            }

	                                name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yen_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yen_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#yuan
	yuan_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = yuan_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_yuan_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = yuan_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #yuan
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = yuan_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:yuan_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:yuan_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:yuan_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yuan_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = yuan_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_yuan_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = seller
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = yuan_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
	        save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
	            scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
	                money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #money_value_target_real
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	            #stockpiling_yuan_state > 1000000
	        }
	        
	        scope:seller = {
	            #yuan
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = yuan_quantity_var
	                    #value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = stockpiling_yuan_state
	                        multiply = 0.50
	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:yuan_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:yuan_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_yuan_state > var:yuan_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yuan_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}	
	#yugoslav_dinar
	yugoslav_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = yugoslav_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #yugoslav_dinar
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
	                }
	
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        var:yugoslav_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state
	                            money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yugoslav_dinar_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yugoslav_dinar_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = yugoslav_dinar_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state > var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var

	                        }

	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########

	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }

	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_yugoslav_dinar_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }

	#zloti
	zloti_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = {		    
	    set_variable = {
	        name = zloti_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	        value = 0
	    }
	}
	buy_undervalued_zloti_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }
	
	    root = {
	        save_scope_as = buyer
	    }
	
	    random_in_list = {
	        variable = zloti_currency_law_list
	        save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	    }
	
	    if = {
	        limit = {
	            exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
	            scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	                has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
	                 ##money_supply_state > 10000000
	                not = {
	                    has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        scope:buyer = {
	            #zloti
	            if = {
	                limit = {
	                    not  = {
	                        has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
	                        or = {
	                            is_subject = yes
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
	                            is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
	                            has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	                    
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = zloti_quantity_var
	                    value = { 1000000 10000000 }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:zloti_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }

	                    name = stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
	                    value = var:zloti_quantity_var
	                }

	                    limit = {
	                        var:zloti_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation = 0
	                        var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	
	                        
	                    }
	                    #notification
	                    if = {
	                        limit = {
	                            var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity > 1
	                        }
	                        post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_buy_message
	                        scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_buy_message
	                        }
	                    }
	                    #Order limit 
	                    set_variable = {
	                        name = zloti_global_monetary_reference_order_limitation
	                        value = 1
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	sell_overrated_zloti_global_monetary_reference_gs = {
	    every_country = {
	        limit  = {
	            is_player = yes
	        }
	        save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	    }

	                    }
	                }
	
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                    value = {
	                        value = 1
	                        add = var:zloti_quantity_var
	                        multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
	                    }
	                }
	                
	                set_variable = {
	                    name = stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
	                    value = var:zloti_quantity_var
	                }
	        
	                if = {
	                    limit = {
	                        stockpiling_zloti_state > var:zloti_quantity_var
	                        scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                            scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
	                        }
	                    }
	                    every_scope_state = {
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                is_capital = yes
	                            }
	                            #########
	    
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                            }
	                            #########
	                            
	                            change_variable = {
	                                name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
	                                subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                    scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
	                        every_scope_state = {
	                            if = {
	                                limit = {
	                                    has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
	                                    is_capital = yes
	                                }
	                                #########
	    
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
	                                    subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
	                                }
	                                #########
	
	                                change_variable = {
	                                    name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
	                                    add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
	                                }
	                            }
	                        }
	                        #notification
	                        if = {
	                            limit = {
	                                scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity > 1
	                            }
	                            post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_buy_message
	                            scope:is_player_for_notification = {
	                                post_notification = global_monetary_reference_are_zloti_buy_message
	                            }
	                        }
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}#end_tag_5

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#  █████╗ ██╗    ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██╗   ██╗ ██╗███████╗███████╗██╗     ██╗                                                                                                                        
# ██╔══██╗██║    ██╔══██╗██║   ██║╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██║     ██║                                                                                                                        
# ███████║██║    ██████╔╝██║   ██║ ╚████╔╝██╔╝ ███████╗█████╗  ██║     ██║                                                                                                                        
# ██╔══██║██║    ██╔══██╗██║   ██║  ╚██╔╝██╔╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██║                                                                                                                        
# ██║  ██║██║    ██████╔╝╚██████╔╝   ██║██╔╝   ███████║███████╗███████╗███████╗                                                                                                                   
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝    ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝    ╚═╝╚═╝    ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝                                                                                                                   
#                                                                                                                                                                                                 
# ██╗   ██╗███╗   ██╗██████╗ ███████╗██████╗ ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗███████╗    ██╗██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗███████╗██╗     
# ██║   ██║████╗  ██║██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝   ██╔╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝██║     
# ██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║  ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   █████╗    ██╔╝ ██║  ██║█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   █████╗  ██║     
# ██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██║  ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██╔══╝   ██╔╝  ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██╔══╝  ██║     
# ╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██████╔╝███████╗██║  ██║ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ███████╗██╔╝   ██████╔╝███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ███████╗███████╗
#  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝╚═╝    ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝╚══════╝
#                                                                                                                                                                                                 
#  ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗                                                                                                                            
# ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝                                                                                                                            
# ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝

# ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║                                                                                                                               
#  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝
