#begin_tag_6	
#algerian_dinar
buy_algerian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = algerian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#algerian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = algerian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_algerian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_algerian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = algerian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#algerian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = algerian_dinar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state > var:algerian_dinar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_algerian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#argentine_peso
buy_argentine_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = argentine_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#argentine_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = argentine_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_argentine_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_argentine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_argentine_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = argentine_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#argentine_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = argentine_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_argentine_peso_state > var:argentine_peso_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_argentine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ariary
buy_ariary_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ariary_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#ariary
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ariary_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ariary_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:ariary_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ariary_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ariary_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_ariary_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ariary_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#ariary
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ariary_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_ariary_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ariary_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:ariary_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_ariary_state > var:ariary_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ariary_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#australian_dollar
buy_australian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = australian_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#australian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = australian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_australian_dollar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_australian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = australian_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#australian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = australian_dollar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_australian_dollar_state > var:australian_dollar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#baht
buy_baht_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = baht_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#baht
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = baht_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:baht_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:baht_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_baht_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_baht_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_baht_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = baht_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#baht
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = baht_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_baht_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:baht_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:baht_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_baht_state > var:baht_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_baht_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#bavarian_gulden
buy_bavarian_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = bavarian_gulden_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#bavarian_gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_bavarian_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = bavarian_gulden_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#bavarian_gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state > var:bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_bavarian_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#belgian_franc
buy_belgian_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = belgian_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = belgian_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_belgian_franc_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = belgian_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = belgian_franc_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_belgian_franc_state > var:belgian_franc_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#brazilian_real
buy_brazilian_real_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = brazilian_real_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#brazilian_real
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = brazilian_real_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_brazilian_real_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_brazilian_real_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_brazilian_real_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = brazilian_real_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#brazilian_real
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = brazilian_real_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_brazilian_real_state > var:brazilian_real_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_brazilian_real_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#canadian_dollar
buy_canadian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = canadian_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#canadian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = canadian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_canadian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = canadian_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#canadian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_canadian_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = canadian_dollar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state > var:canadian_dollar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#caribbean_dollar
buy_caribbean_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = caribbean_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#caribbean_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = caribbean_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#caribbean_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_caribbean_dollar_currency

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state > var:caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_caribbean_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#central_african_eco
buy_central_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = central_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#central_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = central_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_central_african_eco_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_central_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_central_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = central_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#central_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_central_african_eco_currency
