							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = central_african_eco_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_central_african_eco_state > var:central_african_eco_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_central_african_eco_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_central_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#chilean_peso
buy_chilean_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = chilean_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#chilean_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = chilean_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_chilean_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_chilean_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_chilean_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = chilean_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#chilean_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_chilean_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = chilean_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_chilean_peso_state > var:chilean_peso_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_chilean_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_chilean_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#colombian_peso
buy_colombian_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = colombian_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#colombian_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:colombian_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:colombian_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_colombian_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_colombian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = colombian_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_colombian_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

			}
		}

			#colombian_peso

							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:colombian_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}

						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_colombian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_colombian_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}

								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_colombian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#confederate_states_dollar
buy_confederate_states_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = confederate_states_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_confederate_states_dollar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#confederate_states_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_confederate_states_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

					name = confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

					name = stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

					name = stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_confederate_states_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = confederate_states_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_confederate_states_dollar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state > var:confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#costa_rican_colon
buy_costa_rican_colon_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = costa_rican_colon_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#costa_rican_colon
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_costa_rican_colon_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_costa_rican_colon_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = costa_rican_colon_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#costa_rican_colon
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_costa_rican_colon_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state > var:costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_costa_rican_colon_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_costa_rican_colon_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#cuban_peso
buy_cuban_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = cuban_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#cuban_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_cuban_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_cuban_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = cuban_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#cuban_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_cuban_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_cuban_peso_state > var:cuban_peso_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_cuban_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_cuban_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#czech_koruna
buy_czech_koruna_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = czech_koruna_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#czech_koruna
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = czech_koruna_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_czech_koruna_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_czech_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_czech_koruna_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = czech_koruna_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_czech_koruna_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}

					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_czech_koruna_state > var:czech_koruna_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_czech_koruna_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_czech_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#danish_krone
buy_danish_krone_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = danish_krone_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#danish_krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = danish_krone_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:danish_krone_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:danish_krone_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_danish_krone_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_danish_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_danish_krone_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = danish_krone_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#danish_krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_danish_krone_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = danish_krone_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_danish_krone_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:danish_krone_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:danish_krone_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_danish_krone_state > var:danish_krone_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_danish_krone_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_danish_krone_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dong
buy_dong_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = dong_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#dong
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = dong_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dong_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dong_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dong_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dong_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dong_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dong_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dong_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = dong_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#dong
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dong_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = dong_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_dong_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dong_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dong_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_dong_state > var:dong_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dong_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dong_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dong_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#drachma
buy_drachma_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = drachma_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#drachma
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = drachma_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:drachma_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:drachma_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_drachma_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_drachma_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_drachma_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = drachma_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#drachma
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = drachma_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_drachma_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:drachma_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:drachma_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_drachma_state > var:drachma_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_drachma_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar
buy_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dinar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_dinar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_dinar_state > var:dinar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ducato
buy_ducato_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ducato_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#ducato
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ducato_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ducato_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:ducato_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ducato_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ducato_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_ducato_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ducato_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#ducato
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ducato_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ducato_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_ducato_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ducato_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:ducato_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_ducato_state > var:ducato_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ducato_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ducato_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#east_african_eco
buy_east_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = east_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#east_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = east_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_east_african_eco_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_east_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_east_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = east_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#east_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_east_african_eco_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = east_african_eco_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_east_african_eco_state > var:east_african_eco_quantity_var
