							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_east_african_eco_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_east_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ecuadorian_peso
buy_ecuadorian_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ecuadorian_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#ecuadorian_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ecuadorian_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_ecuadorian_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ecuadorian_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#ecuadorian_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ecuadorian_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state > var:ecuadorian_peso_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ecuadorian_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#egyptian_pound
buy_egyptian_pound_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = egyptian_pound_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#egyptian_pound
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = egyptian_pound_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_egyptian_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = egyptian_pound_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_egyptian_pound_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}

			#egyptian_pound
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

					name = egyptian_pound_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

					name = stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:egyptian_pound_quantity_var
				}

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_egyptian_pound_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {

							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_egyptian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#el_salvador_colon
buy_el_salvador_colon_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = el_salvador_colon_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colon_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#el_salvador_colon
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colon_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = el_salvador_colon_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:el_salvador_colon_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:el_salvador_colon_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_el_salvador_colon_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = el_salvador_colon_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_el_salvador_colon_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

			}
		}

				limit = {

							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = el_salvador_colon_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:el_salvador_colon_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:el_salvador_colon_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state > var:el_salvador_colon_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_el_salvador_colon_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_el_salvador_colon_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#estonian_kroon
buy_estonian_kroon_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = estonian_kroon_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#estonian_kroon
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = estonian_kroon_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_estonian_kroon_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_estonian_kroon_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = estonian_kroon_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#estonian_kroon
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_estonian_kroon_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = estonian_kroon_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state > var:estonian_kroon_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_estonian_kroon_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_estonian_kroon_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ethiopian_birr
buy_ethiopian_birr_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ethiopian_birr_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#ethiopian_birr
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ethiopian_birr_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_ethiopian_birr_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ethiopian_birr_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}

			#ethiopian_birr
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ethiopian_birr_currency

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:ethiopian_birr_quantity_var
				}

					limit = {

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ethiopian_birr_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ethiopian_birr_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#finnish_markka
buy_finnish_markka_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = finnish_markka_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#finnish_markka
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = finnish_markka_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

					name = stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:finnish_markka_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:finnish_markka_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_finnish_markka_state

								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_finnish_markka_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = finnish_markka_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#finnish_markka
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_finnish_markka_currency

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = finnish_markka_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:finnish_markka_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:finnish_markka_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_finnish_markka_state > var:finnish_markka_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_finnish_markka_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_finnish_markka_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#florin
buy_florin_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = florin_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = florin_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:florin_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:florin_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_florin_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_florin_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_florin_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = florin_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = florin_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_florin_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:florin_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:florin_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_florin_state > var:florin_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_florin_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#french_franc
buy_french_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = french_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#french_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = french_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:french_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:french_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_french_franc_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_french_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_french_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_french_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = french_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#french_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_french_franc_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = french_franc_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_french_franc_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:french_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:french_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_french_franc_state > var:french_franc_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_french_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_french_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ghanaian_cedi
buy_ghanaian_cedi_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ghanaian_cedi_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#ghanaian_cedi
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ghanaian_cedi_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_ghanaian_cedi_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ghanaian_cedi_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#ghanaian_cedi
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ghanaian_cedi_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state > var:ghanaian_cedi_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ghanaian_cedi_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ghanaian_cedi_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#gulden
buy_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = gulden_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:gulden_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_gulden_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = gulden_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_gulden_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:gulden_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_gulden_state > var:gulden_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#guatemalan_quetzal
buy_guatemalan_quetzal_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = guatemalan_quetzal_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#guatemalan_quetzal
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_guatemalan_quetzal_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = guatemalan_quetzal_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#guatemalan_quetzal
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state > var:guatemalan_quetzal_quantity_var

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_guatemalan_quetzal_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#hannoveraner_thaler
buy_hannoveraner_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = hannoveraner_thaler_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#hannoveraner_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_hannoveraner_thaler_currency

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

						value = 1
						add = var:hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var

							}
							#########

								name = stockpiling_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = hannoveraner_thaler_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}

					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
