	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = indonesian_rupiah_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#indonesian_rupiah
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_indonesian_rupiah_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state > var:indonesian_rupiah_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_indonesian_rupiah_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#iraqi_dinar
buy_iraqi_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = iraqi_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#iraqi_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_iraqi_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_iraqi_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = iraqi_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#iraqi_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_iraqi_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state > var:iraqi_dinar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_iraqi_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_iraqi_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#irish_pound
buy_irish_pound_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = irish_pound_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#irish_pound
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = irish_pound_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_irish_pound_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_irish_pound_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_irish_pound_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = irish_pound_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#irish_pound
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_irish_pound_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = irish_pound_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_irish_pound_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:irish_pound_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_irish_pound_state > var:irish_pound_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_irish_pound_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_irish_pound_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#korean_won
buy_korean_won_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = korean_won_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#korean_won
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = korean_won_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:korean_won_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:korean_won_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_korean_won_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_korean_won_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_korean_won_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = korean_won_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#korean_won
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_korean_won_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = korean_won_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_korean_won_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:korean_won_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:korean_won_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_korean_won_state > var:korean_won_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_korean_won_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_korean_won_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#laotian_kip
buy_laotian_kip_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = laotian_kip_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#laotian_kip
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = laotian_kip_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:laotian_kip_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:laotian_kip_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_laotian_kip_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_laotian_kip_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_laotian_kip_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = laotian_kip_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#laotian_kip
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_laotian_kip_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = laotian_kip_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:laotian_kip_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:laotian_kip_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_laotian_kip_state > var:laotian_kip_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_laotian_kip_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_laotian_kip_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#latvian_lats
buy_latvian_lats_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = latvian_lats_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#latvian_lats
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = latvian_lats_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_latvian_lats_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_latvian_lats_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_latvian_lats_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = latvian_lats_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#latvian_lats
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_latvian_lats_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = latvian_lats_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_latvian_lats_state > var:latvian_lats_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_latvian_lats_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_latvian_lats_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#leu
buy_leu_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = leu_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#leu
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = leu_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:leu_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:leu_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_leu_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_leu_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_leu_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = leu_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#leu
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = leu_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_leu_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:leu_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:leu_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_leu_state > var:leu_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_leu_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lev
buy_lev_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = lev_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#lev
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = lev_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:lev_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:lev_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lev_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lev_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_lev_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = lev_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#lev
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lev_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = lev_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_lev_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:lev_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:lev_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_lev_state > var:lev_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_lev_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lev_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#liberian_dollar
buy_liberian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = liberian_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#liberian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = liberian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_liberian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = liberian_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#liberian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_liberian_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = liberian_dollar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state > var:liberian_dollar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_liberian_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_liberian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#libyan_dinar
buy_libyan_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = libyan_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#libyan_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = libyan_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}

					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_libyan_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_libyan_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = libyan_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#libyan_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_libyan_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = libyan_dinar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state > var:libyan_dinar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_libyan_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_libyan_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lira
buy_lira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:lira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:lira_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lira_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = lira_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_lira_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:lira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:lira_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_lira_state > var:lira_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lithuanian_litas
buy_lithuanian_litas_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = lithuanian_litas_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#lithuanian_litas
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_lithuanian_litas_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_lithuanian_litas_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = lithuanian_litas_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#lithuanian_litas
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lithuanian_litas_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state > var:lithuanian_litas_quantity_var
