							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_lithuanian_litas_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_lithuanian_litas_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#luxembourgish_franc
buy_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#luxembourgish_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#luxembourgish_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_luxembourgish_franc_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state > var:luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#mark
buy_mark_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = mark_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = mark_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:mark_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:mark_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_mark_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_mark_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = mark_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = mark_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_mark_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:mark_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:mark_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_mark_state > var:mark_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mark_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#mexican_peso
buy_mexican_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = mexican_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#mexican_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = mexican_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mexican_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_mexican_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = mexican_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#mexican_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_mexican_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = mexican_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:mexican_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_mexican_peso_state > var:mexican_peso_quantity_var

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_mexican_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_mexican_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#moroccan_dirham
buy_moroccan_dirham_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = moroccan_dirham_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#moroccan_dirham
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency

							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

					name = stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold

						value = 1
						add = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}

					name = stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
				}

					limit = {

							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state

								name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_moroccan_dirham_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#moroccan_dirham
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_moroccan_dirham_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state > var:moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_moroccan_dirham_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_moroccan_dirham_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#new_zealand_dollar
buy_new_zealand_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = new_zealand_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#new_zealand_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_new_zealand_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_new_zealand_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = new_zealand_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#new_zealand_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_new_zealand_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state > var:new_zealand_dollar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_new_zealand_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#nicaraguan_cordoba
buy_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = nicaraguan_cordoba_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#nicaraguan_cordoba
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = nicaraguan_cordoba_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

			}
		}

							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}

					name = nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }

						value = 1

						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

					name = stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold

						value = 1
						add = var:nicaraguan_cordoba_quantity_var

					}

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#nigerian_naira
buy_nigerian_naira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = nigerian_naira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency

				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#nigerian_naira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency

					}
				}

							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold

							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_nigerian_naira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = nigerian_naira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#nigerian_naira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_nigerian_naira_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = nigerian_naira_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state > var:nigerian_naira_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_nigerian_naira_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#norwegian_krone
buy_norwegian_krone_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = norwegian_krone_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#norwegian_krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = norwegian_krone_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_norwegian_krone_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_norwegian_krone_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = norwegian_krone_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#norwegian_krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_norwegian_krone_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = norwegian_krone_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state > var:norwegian_krone_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_norwegian_krone_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_norwegian_krone_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#omanian_rial
buy_omanian_rial_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = omanian_rial_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#omanian_rial
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = omanian_rial_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_omanian_rial_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_omanian_rial_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_omanian_rial_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = omanian_rial_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#omanian_rial
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_omanian_rial_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = omanian_rial_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_omanian_rial_state > var:omanian_rial_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_omanian_rial_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ottoman_lira
buy_ottoman_lira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ottoman_lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ottoman_lira_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ottoman_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_ottoman_lira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ottoman_lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ottoman_lira_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state > var:ottoman_lira_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ottoman_lira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#pakistani_rupee
buy_pakistani_rupee_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = pakistani_rupee_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#pakistani_rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = pakistani_rupee_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:pakistani_rupee_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:pakistani_rupee_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pakistani_rupee_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_pakistani_rupee_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = pakistani_rupee_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#pakistani_rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_pakistani_rupee_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = pakistani_rupee_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:pakistani_rupee_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:pakistani_rupee_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state > var:pakistani_rupee_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_pakistani_rupee_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pakistani_rupee_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#paraguayan_guarani
buy_paraguayan_guarani_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = paraguayan_guarani_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#paraguayan_guarani
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = paraguayan_guarani_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:paraguayan_guarani_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:paraguayan_guarani_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_paraguayan_guarani_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_paraguayan_guarani_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = paraguayan_guarani_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#paraguayan_guarani
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_paraguayan_guarani_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = paraguayan_guarani_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:paraguayan_guarani_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:paraguayan_guarani_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state > var:paraguayan_guarani_quantity_var
