							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_paraguayan_guarani_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_paraguayan_guarani_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peseta
buy_peseta_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = peseta_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = peseta_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peseta_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:peseta_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_peseta_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peseta_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peseta_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = peseta_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = peseta_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_peseta_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peseta_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:peseta_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_peseta_state > var:peseta_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peseta_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso
buy_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_peso_state > var:peso_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_bolivien
buy_peso_bolivien_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = peso_bolivien_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#peso_bolivien
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_bolivien_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_bolivien_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = peso_bolivien_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#peso_bolivien
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_bolivien_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state > var:peso_bolivien_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_peso_bolivien_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#philippine_peso
buy_philippine_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = philippine_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#philippine_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = philippine_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_philippine_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_philippine_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = philippine_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#philippine_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_philippine_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = philippine_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_philippine_peso_state > var:philippine_peso_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_philippine_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_philippine_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#pound_sterling
buy_pound_sterling_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = pound_sterling_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#pound_sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = pound_sterling_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_pound_sterling_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_pound_sterling_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = pound_sterling_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#pound_sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = pound_sterling_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_pound_sterling_state > var:pound_sterling_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_pound_sterling_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#prussian_thaler
buy_prussian_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = prussian_thaler_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#prussian_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = prussian_thaler_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_prussian_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = prussian_thaler_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
