				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#prussian_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_prussian_thaler_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = prussian_thaler_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state > var:prussian_thaler_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_prussian_thaler_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#qiran
buy_qiran_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = qiran_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = qiran_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:qiran_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:qiran_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_qiran_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_qiran_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = qiran_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = qiran_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_qiran_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:qiran_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:qiran_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_qiran_state > var:qiran_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#real
buy_real_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = real_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = real_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:real_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:real_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_real_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_real_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_real_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_real_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = real_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = real_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_real_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:real_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:real_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_real_state > var:real_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_real_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_real_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#ruble
buy_ruble_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ruble_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#ruble
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ruble_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ruble_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:ruble_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_ruble_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_ruble_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_ruble_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = ruble_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#ruble
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ruble_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = ruble_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_ruble_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:ruble_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:ruble_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_ruble_state > var:ruble_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_ruble_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#saudi_riyal
buy_saudi_riyal_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = saudi_riyal_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#saudi_riyal
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = saudi_riyal_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_saudi_riyal_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = saudi_riyal_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#saudi_riyal
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_saudi_riyal_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = saudi_riyal_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state > var:saudi_riyal_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_saudi_riyal_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#saxon_thaler
buy_saxon_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = saxon_thaler_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#saxon_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:saxon_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_saxon_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = saxon_thaler_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#saxon_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_saxon_thaler_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:saxon_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state > var:saxon_thaler_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_saxon_thaler_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#scudo_pontificio
buy_scudo_pontificio_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = scudo_pontificio_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#scudo_pontificio
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_pontificio_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_scudo_pontificio_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = scudo_pontificio_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#scudo_pontificio
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_scudo_pontificio_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state > var:scudo_pontificio_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_scudo_pontificio_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_pontificio_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#scudo_sardo
buy_scudo_sardo_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = scudo_sardo_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#scudo_sardo
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = scudo_sardo_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_scudo_sardo_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_scudo_sardo_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = scudo_sardo_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#scudo_sardo
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_scudo_sardo_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = scudo_sardo_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state > var:scudo_sardo_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_scudo_sardo_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_scudo_sardo_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#serbian_dinar
buy_serbian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = serbian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#serbian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = serbian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_serbian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = serbian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#serbian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_serbian_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = serbian_dinar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state > var:serbian_dinar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_serbian_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#sierra_leonean_leone
buy_sierra_leonean_leone_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = sierra_leonean_leone_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#sierra_leonean_leone
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_sierra_leonean_leone_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = sierra_leonean_leone_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#sierra_leonean_leone
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sierra_leonean_leone_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state > var:sierra_leonean_leone_quantity_var

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_sierra_leonean_leone_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sierra_leonean_leone_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#slovak_koruna
buy_slovak_koruna_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = slovak_koruna_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list

					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#slovak_koruna
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency

							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union

							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}

				}

					name = stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_slovak_koruna_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_slovak_koruna_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = slovak_koruna_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#slovak_koruna
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_slovak_koruna_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = slovak_koruna_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state > var:slovak_koruna_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_slovak_koruna_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_slovak_koruna_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#sol_de_oro
buy_sol_de_oro_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = sol_de_oro_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#sol_de_oro
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = sol_de_oro_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_sol_de_oro_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_sol_de_oro_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = sol_de_oro_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#sol_de_oro
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sol_de_oro_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = sol_de_oro_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state > var:sol_de_oro_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_sol_de_oro_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_sol_de_oro_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#south_african_rand
buy_south_african_rand_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = south_african_rand_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#south_african_rand
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = south_african_rand_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_south_african_rand_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = south_african_rand_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
