				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#south_african_rand
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_south_african_rand_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = south_african_rand_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_south_african_rand_state > var:south_african_rand_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_south_african_rand_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#south_german_gulden
buy_south_german_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = south_german_gulden_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#south_german_gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = south_german_gulden_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_south_german_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_south_german_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = south_german_gulden_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#south_german_gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_south_german_gulden_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = south_german_gulden_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state > var:south_german_gulden_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_south_german_gulden_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_south_german_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#swedish_krona
buy_swedish_krona_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = swedish_krona_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#swedish_krona
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = swedish_krona_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swedish_krona_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_swedish_krona_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = swedish_krona_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#swedish_krona
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swedish_krona_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = swedish_krona_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_swedish_krona_state > var:swedish_krona_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_swedish_krona_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swedish_krona_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#swiss_franc
buy_swiss_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = swiss_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#swiss_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = swiss_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_swiss_franc_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_swiss_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = swiss_franc_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#swiss_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = swiss_franc_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_swiss_franc_state > var:swiss_franc_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#toscane_lira
buy_toscane_lira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = toscane_lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#toscane_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = toscane_lira_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_toscane_lira_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_toscane_lira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = toscane_lira_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#toscane_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_toscane_lira_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = toscane_lira_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_toscane_lira_state > var:toscane_lira_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_toscane_lira_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_toscane_lira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#tunisian_dinar
buy_tunisian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#tunisian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_tunisian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#tunisian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_tunisian_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state > var:tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_tunisian_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#tuareg_ouguiya
buy_tuareg_ouguiya_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = tuareg_ouguiya_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#tuareg_ouguiya
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_tuareg_ouguiya_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = tuareg_ouguiya_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#tuareg_ouguiya
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state > var:tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#uni
buy_uni_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = uni_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#uni
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = uni_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:uni_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:uni_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_uni_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_uni_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = uni_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#uni
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_uni_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = uni_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_uni_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:uni_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:uni_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_uni_state > var:uni_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_uni_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uni_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#united_states_dollar
buy_united_states_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = united_states_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#united_states_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = united_states_dollar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:united_states_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:united_states_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_united_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_united_states_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = united_states_dollar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#united_states_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_united_states_dollar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = united_states_dollar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:united_states_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:united_states_dollar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state > var:united_states_dollar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_united_states_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_united_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#uruguayan_peso
buy_uruguayan_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = uruguayan_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#uruguayan_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_uruguayan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_uruguayan_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = uruguayan_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#uruguayan_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_uruguayan_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state > var:uruguayan_peso_quantity_var

							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_uruguayan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#venezuelan_peso
buy_venezuelan_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = venezuelan_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#venezuelan_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_venezuelan_peso_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_venezuelan_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = venezuelan_peso_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#venezuelan_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_venezuelan_peso_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state > var:venezuelan_peso_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_venezuelan_peso_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_venezuelan_peso_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#west_african_eco
buy_west_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = west_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#west_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = west_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_west_african_eco_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = west_african_eco_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#west_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_west_african_eco_currency

							is_subject = yes

							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = west_african_eco_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_west_african_eco_state > var:west_african_eco_quantity_var
