							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_west_african_eco_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#yen
buy_yen_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = yen_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = yen_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:yen_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:yen_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yen_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_yen_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = yen_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = yen_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_yen_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:yen_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:yen_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_yen_state > var:yen_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yen_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#yuan
buy_yuan_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = yuan_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = yuan_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:yuan_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:yuan_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yuan_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_yuan_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = yuan_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = yuan_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_yuan_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:yuan_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:yuan_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_yuan_state > var:yuan_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#yugoslav_dinar
buy_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#yugoslav_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#yugoslav_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yugoslav_dinar_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state > var:yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#zloti
buy_zloti_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = zloti_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
				#money_supply_state > 10000000
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:buyer = {
			#zloti
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = zloti_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:zloti_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:zloti_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_zloti_state
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_zloti_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_list = {
		variable = zloti_currency_law_list #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
				not = {
					OR = {
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}

				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
				}
			}
		}
		
		scope:seller = {
			#zloti
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_zloti_currency
						or = {
							is_subject = yes
							is_subject_type = subject_type_customs_union
							is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}
					
				set_variable = {
					name = zloti_quantity_var
					#value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = stockpiling_zloti_state
						multiply = 0.50
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:zloti_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}
				}
				
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:zloti_quantity_var
				}
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						stockpiling_zloti_state > var:zloti_quantity_var
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########
	
							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########
							
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########
	
								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_zloti_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#end_tag_6

# ██████╗  █████╗ ██████╗ ██╗████████╗██╗   ██╗     ██╗    ██╗██╗████████╗██╗  ██╗        ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗███████╗         ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗    
# ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║╚══██╔══╝╚██╗ ██╔╝     ██║    ██║██║╚══██╔══╝██║  ██║        ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝        ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗   
# ██████╔╝███████║██████╔╝██║   ██║    ╚████╔╝      ██║ █╗ ██║██║   ██║   ███████║        ██████╔╝█████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║     █████╗          ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝   
# ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██╔══██╗██║   ██║     ╚██╔╝       ██║███╗██║██║   ██║   ██╔══██║        ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║     ██╔══╝          ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗   
# ██║     ██║  ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║      ██║███████╗╚███╔███╔╝██║   ██║   ██║  ██║███████╗██║  ██║███████╗██║     ███████╗██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗███████╗███████╗╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝   ╚═╝      ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚══╝╚══╝ ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   
#                                                                                                                                                                                                       
# ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗        ██████╗ ███████╗██████╗      ██╗   ██╗███████╗ █████╗ ██████╗ 
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝     ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║        ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔══██╗     ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗
# ██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝      ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║        ██████╔╝█████╗  ██████╔╝      ╚████╔╝ █████╗  ███████║██████╔╝
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝       ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║        ██╔═══╝ ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗       ╚██╔╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██║██╔══██╗

gold_parity_with_reference_currency_correction_per_year = {                                
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_effective
		value = {
			add = global_monetary_reference
			multiply = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_1
		}
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_1
		value = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_effective
	}
}

# ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗███████╗     ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗███╗   ██╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝    ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║████╗  ██║
# ██████╔╝█████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║     █████╗      ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝     ██║██╔██╗ ██║

# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝╚══════╝     ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝

reference_currency_in_gold_fixe = {
	set_variable = {
		name = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_fixe
		value = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_in_gold_fixe
		value = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_in_gold
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_exchange_rate_with_reference_currency_fixe
		value = money_value_exchange_rate_with_reference_currency
	}
}

#  ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██████╗         ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ██╗   ██╗███████╗███████╗        ██╗██████╗ 
# ██╔════╝ ██╔═══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗        ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝       ███║██╔══██╗
# ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗  ██████╔╝██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗       ╚██║██████╔╝
# ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║        ██║██╔══██╗
# ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝███████╗██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗██║  ██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║███████╗██║██████╔╝
#  ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═════╝

gold_reserves_1B  = {
	set_variable = {
		name = transfer_var
		value = gold_reserves_var
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = transfer_var
		subtract = 1000000000
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = transfer_var_in_gold
		value = var:transfer_var
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = transfer_var_in_gold
		multiply = 1 #money_value_rapported_inflation #Desactivated for now, transfer by too large a quantity of gold arrives in the central bank otherwise
	}
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
				add = root.var:transfer_var_in_gold
			}
		}
	}
	add_treasury = {
		subtract = var:transfer_var
	}
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

sell_currency_10_on_international_market = {
		change_variable = {
			name = credit_at_central_bank
			subtract = all_currency_in_gold_10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:credit_at_central_bank < 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = credit_at_central_bank
				multiply = -1
			}
			add_treasury = {
				add = var:credit_at_central_bank
			}
			# every_scope_state = {
			# 	if = {
			# 		limit = {
			# 			has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
			# 			is_capital = yes
			# 		}
			# 		change_variable = {
			# 			name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
			# 			add = root.var:credit_at_central_bank
			# 		}
			# 	}
			# }
			set_variable = {
				name = credit_at_central_bank
				value = 0
			}
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_algerian_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_algerian_dinar_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_argentine_peso_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_argentine_peso_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_ariary_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_ariary_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ariary_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_ariary_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_australian_dollar_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_australian_dollar_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bahraini_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_bahraini_dinar_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_baht_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_baht_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_baht_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_baht_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bavarian_gulden_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
						}
					}
				}		
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					subtract  = {
						value = var:stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						multiply = 0.1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency

						value = var:stockpiling_cambodian_riel_state_1

					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_place
					stockpiling_canadian_dollar_state_1 > 1000000
					root  = {
						NOT  = {

					}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#  global var fot all currency

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################


#algerian_dinar
money_value_algerian_dinar_global_var = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_algerian_dinar_global_var
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = algerian_dinar_reference
				}
				add = money_value_target_real
			}
		}
	}
}
#argentine_peso
money_value_argentine_peso_global_var = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_argentine_peso_global_var
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = argentine_peso_reference
				}
				add = money_value_target_real
			}
		}
	}
}
#ariary
money_value_ariary_global_var = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_ariary_global_var
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = ariary_reference
				}
				add = money_value_target_real
			}
		}
	}
}
#australian_dollar
money_value_australian_dollar_global_var = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_australian_dollar_global_var
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = australian_dollar_reference
				}
				add = money_value_target_real
			}
		}
	}
}
#baht
money_value_baht_global_var = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_baht_global_var
		value = {

					has_modifier = peseta_reference
				}
				add = money_value_target_real
			}
		}
	}

# ███╗   ███╗███████╗██████╗ ██╗ █████╗ ███╗   ██╗         ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║██╔══██╗████╗  ██║        ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝
# ██╔████╔██║█████╗  ██║  ██║██║███████║██╔██╗ ██║        ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║     
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██╔══╝  ██║  ██║██║██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║        ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║     
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████╗██████╔╝██║██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝
#                                                                                                                    
# ██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗                                                            
# ╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝                                                            
#  ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗                                                              
#   ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝                                                              
#    ██║███████╗╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗                                                            
#    ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝                                                            

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

median_currency_value = {
	if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_1 > 0 }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_1
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 0.25
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_2 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_2
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 0.50
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_3 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_3
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 0.75
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_4 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_4
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 1.00
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_5 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_5
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 1.25
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_6 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_6
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 1.50
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_7 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_7
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 1.75
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_8 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_8
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 2.00
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_9 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_9
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 2.25
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_10 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_10
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 2.50
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_11 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_11
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 2.75
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_12 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_12
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 3.00
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_13 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_13
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 3.25
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_14 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_14
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 3.50
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_15 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_15
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 3.75
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_16 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_16
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 4.00
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_17 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_17
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 4.25
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_18 > highest_median_currency_value }

			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_18
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 4.50
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_19 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_19
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 4.75
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_20 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_20
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 5.00
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_21 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_21
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 5.25
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_22 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_22
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 5.50
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_23 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_23
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 5.75
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_24 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_24
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 6.00
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_25 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_25
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 6.25
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { median_currency_value_26 > highest_median_currency_value }
		set_variable = {
			name = highest_median_currency_value
			value = median_currency_value_26
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_median
			value = 6.50
		}
	}
